reviews.text: Excellent location close to main squares. Very safe and secure with 24hr security guard. Rooms are basic but have hot showers and tv and are of a decent size. In room safe facilities also available as well as internet access and snack bar in the lobby - handy for travellers arriving and departing at unsociable hours form Lima airport! Staff are friendly and very helpful and can arrange reasonably priced transfers to and from the airport (generally much cheaper than those offered by your tour operator) as well as to neighbouring areas such as Miraflores. Can be bit cold in winter, but extra blankets etc available if you ask the friendly reception. Nothing flash, but a good safe bet for a hassle free stay.
reviews.title: Safe and Central

likes.liked: — Very secure and very helpful reception who speak excellent English
likes.disliked: — Little bit cold in the rooms

reviews.text: Small friendly hotel in Central Lima, bookable direct by Email, they can arrange reliable pick-up at Lima Airport. Rooms basic but functional, clean and friendly, a bit cold in winter, but water always hot. Safe in room.Koala cafe attached is OK too. Secure front door, close to centre of Lima. Used by overland organised tours. Secure alternative to a hostel. Excellent supermarket just around the corner. Miraflores is a much nicer area to stay.
reviews.title: Small friendly central hotel
